actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the mileage rate used to determine the amount allowable as a deduction for the business use of automobiles shall be the same as the rate used to reimburse Federal employees.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the mileage rate used to determine the amount allowable as an income tax deduction for the business use of automobiles shall be the same as the rate used to reimburse Federal employees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the mileage rate used to determine the amount allowable as a deduction for the business use of automobiles shall be the same as the rate used to reimburse Federal employees.
